text: @WhiteHouse Failing. Failing to meet even minimum guidelines set by the very medical and scientific experts in trump’s administration. Hard to argue with the real facts, facts trump finds too “inconvenient” to talk about. 80,000 dead Americans and still no coherent federal COVID-19 plan.
